plot: Lawyer Amy finds herself courted by two very different men: her client, a roguish street musician named Will, and, her ex John Michael. A curious triagle develops as Amy gets pregnant by Will and both men vie for her affectoins.
title: Second Thoughts
plot_es: Lawyer Amy finds herself courted by two very different men: her client, a roguish street musician named Will, and, her ex John Michael. A curious triagle develops as Amy gets pregnant by Will and both men vie for her affectoins.
plot_en: Lawyer Amy finds herself courted by two very different men: her client, a roguish street musician named Will, and, her ex John Michael. A curious triagle develops as Amy gets pregnant by Will and both men vie for her affectoins.
